notes: FHO rostered patients: Primary care services are capitated, but most A-codes still billable
General re-assessment (A004) limited to 2 per 12 months per patient
For special/comprehensive consultations, start and stop times must be in medical record
K codes for periodic health visits include all elements of a complete physical exam
Epidural injections (G246, G117, G119, G918) limited to 12 per patient per 12 months combined
